name: Off-Road Transport Trailer
description:
Achieve your goal of becoming a best miner of minerals and gold digging. Drill deep into hard mountains to crush rocks for mining gold and become a mine tycoon. Dig on hilly areas with your heavy driller crane machine crane and load into dumper truck and enjoy hill drive by driving in challenging off-road gold extraction mission.

Features:
- Amazing 3D Graphics
- Realistic environment
- Smooth steering controls
